column1: Local Foods////My husband and I just ate at LF for the first time.  Nice ambiance
column3: industrial chic decor.  Fresh and delectable food with unusual combinations of flavors. I had a roast beef
column6: and curried cauliflower on dense slices of rye.  The bread has to be dense to hold together the stacked high sandwich.  Husband had the shrimp and crab with green goddess dressing in a roll that managed to be both soft and crispy.  Unbelievable.  Try it; you'll love it.
